title: Game Security & Anti-Cheat
overview: Prevent common exploits by validating all actions on the server.
objectives: Identify Speed Hacks and Packet Injection
Understand why Client trust is fatal

sections.title: Common Cheats
sections.content:
1. **Speed Hacks**: Client tells server 'I moved 1000px' in 1 frame.
2. **Packet Injection**: Fake messages sent to server.

**Defense**: Server calculates max possible distance. If client > max, reject movement.

questions.question: What is the layout of the 'Never Trust Client' rule?
options: Clients only handle graphics/input; Server handles logic
Clients handle logic to save server CPU
Server asks client if they cheated
questions.correctAnswer: Clients only handle graphics/input; Server handles logic

questions.question: How to stop speed hacks?
options: Server checks distance moved / time elapsed
questions.correctAnswer: Server checks distance moved / time elapsed

miniProject.title: Speed Limit Validator
steps: If speed > maxSpeed, return false (cheat detected)
